text: Yan Zi was the defending champion, but lost in first round to Olga Puchkova. Anna Chakvetadze won the title, defeating Anabel Medina Garrigues in the final 6–1, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== ==External links== * Official results archive (ITF) * Official results archive (WTA) Category:Guangzhou International Women's Open Category:2006 WTA Tour
title: 2006 Guangzhou International Women's Open – Singles
